title: Rebirth of 1985’s Best Doctor - Novel Updates
tags: Alchemy   Beast Companions   Business Management   Cultivation   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Dreams   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Revenge   Second Chance
author: Zi Yu Yiyi   紫雨漪漪
description:
Through the blood, Su Jinyue saw a familiar figure running towards her. With a sad smile, she only then realized that she had fallen in love with this man. If she could do it again, she will definitely choose to marry him. It’s a pity that there is no ‘if’ in life, and there is no restart…

The blessings of fate brought her back to the beginning. Since God has given her another chance, she will never make the mistakes of her previous life again. In this life, she only wants him. As for the people who hurt her, she will never show mercy.>
